function EP02_22()

    --.転-4【6月第2週】「ちゃんとごめんなさいできて偉いね」
    SaveData.Title = "ちゃんとごめんなさいできて偉いね"

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM03.wav",0)

    MSG([[ That day, Akira was kinder than usual. ]])

    MSG([[ She ate all the vegetables properly, washed the dishes, didn’t start gaming right after eating like usual, and even gave me a massage. ]])

    MSG([[ When I asked, “Is there something you want?” she got a little grumpy and told me why. ]])

    --//BU：アキラ（悲しみ・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03da")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0229.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “At the time of the secret filming fuss, I feel bad for encouraging retaliation… that’s all.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0230.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “It’s not like I think you were wrong, but I thought it wasn’t the kind of method Minachin would usually use. So, that’s why…” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0359.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “You don’t have to worry about that at all. Sorry for asking something weird.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0360.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Thank you, Akira. Just knowing you’re thinking about me like that really makes me happy.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0231.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Uh, um! So, well...” ]])

    MSG([[ Akira fidgeted as if she was hesitant to say something. I stayed patient watching her like that, and she continued, glancing upward to read my expression. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ha")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0232.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “If the Princess Election’s theme is 'Fashion'... could you let me take charge of making the outfit? Actually, I make clothes as a hobby...” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0361.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Huh? You had a hobby like that?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Come to think of it, she knew a lot about Lira-san and had tons of fashion magazines. It made sense that making clothes was her hobby. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ga")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0362.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “B-but there’s less than three weeks until the election, right? Can you really make a costume in that time?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0233.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “If I base it on costumes I’ve already made and just do some tweaks, I think I can manage.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0234.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “If there’s anything this shut-in self can do to help Minachin… it’s nothing more than this, after all.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0363.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Akira...” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That’s not true. Just being with me always gives me so much energy. ]])

    MSG([[ She shouldn’t have to go to such lengths just for me. ]])

    MSG([[ But if I tell her how I feel, she’ll probably just dislike it. ]])

    MSG([[ For Akira, who’s said this much for my sake, I’ll sincerely accept her kindness. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ea")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0364.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Thank you. I’m sorry for such a big favor, but could I ask you?” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("minato_0365.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “If it’s a costume made by you, Akira, I’m sure I can win.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0235.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Really? Ehehehe...” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0236.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “...Ah!” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0237.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Y-you got a promise from me! Now I can test all the risqué costumes I’ve made on Minachin!” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0238.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “I’ll make you the absolute sexiest costumes, so look forward to it!” ]])

    MSG([[ Akira reverted to her usual tone and snorted confidently. ]])

    MSG([[ Even though she sincerely supports me, she’s not straightforward. ]])

    MSG([[ I gave a wry smile at her stubbornness and made a suggestion myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0366.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Could you train me in cross-dressing again this weekend?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    --　　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    --//BG：アキラ宅
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG023aa")
    --//BU：アキラ（通常・部屋着）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask015" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0239.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Yes, just like you said, I brought books that teach about recent trends in fashion and clothing.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0240.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Now that Minachin has learned quite a bit about girls’ fashion, you should understand it properly.” ]])


    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    --//SE：重たいモノを置く音
PLAY_SE("SEb033.wav")
--WAIT(300)

    --//CI：積みあがった本に絶望する雑ミナト 036
LAYER_LOAD(55,"CI036a")
LAYER_POSITION(55,0,200)
LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(55,0,0,500,Ease.OutBounce)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)
--SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ca")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0367.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Eh... this many...?” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0241.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “This is just a portion. Fashion changes with the times, so we have to keep up with the flow.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0242.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “For Minachin, who hasn’t experienced these trends firsthand, to catch up to current fashion, you need to have at least this much information in your mind.” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0243.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Also, on days off, let’s go to the city and observe how the girls are dressing.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0368.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “...Yeah. I’ll do my best to catch up.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ If it had been me before, I’d probably have complained, but now I was able to say something positive. ]])

    MSG([[ Akira smiled with satisfaction at my clear growth. ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ea")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0244.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “But... for Minachin to want to train in cross-dressing on your own...” ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0245.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Two months ago, I never would have imagined this. I’m kinda touched.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03fc")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0369.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “Yeah. Even I’m surprised.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03aa")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0370.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “But Akira, and the knights too, are all working hard for me.” ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_MIN03ba")
PLAY_VOICE("minato_0371.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Minato】
 “I have to do my best too, or I won’t be able to face everyone.” ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0246.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Well, if you master cross-dressing too much, you won’t be able to face your mom either.” ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI03ba")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_0247.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】
 “Anyway, joking aside, let’s start quickly before Minachin’s doubts show on your face. Now, which training menu will you choose?” ]])
    --//選択肢

    -- 　①ビジュアルの訓練
    -- 　②教養の訓練
    -- 　③精神の訓練
    --　　　　　◆

    local result = TrainingSelect()

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- 選択肢分岐
    Training(result , "EP02_23")
end
